title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 16
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 16
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his Chart of the Day "De-FANGing of short sellers concerns BofA Merrill Lynch." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.\u0010\u0010Caleb Melby\u0010Financial Reporter\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing an ambitious plan by Jared Kushner’s family to recast its indebted Fifth Avenue office building as a luxury architectural trophy is collapsing, setting off a chain of events that may imperil the Kushners’ ownership of a property central to their real estate empire.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
